title: Good Smile Wooser's Hand to Mouth Life: Rin and Wooser Nendoroid (Light Version) Action Figure
features: Includes both smiling and glaring expressions
description: From Good Smile Company. Stands approximately 4" tall. "It's been awhile! Rin here!" "I'm back once again." From the anime series wooser's hand-to-mouth life: phantasmagoric arc comes a Nendoroid of Rin with wooser in a simple but more affordable set! Rin comes with a smile that shows off her easygoing personality, as well as a glaring face for when she gets tired of listening to wooser's chatter. wooser himself is also of course included to pose with her! Be sure to display her together with Nendoroid Ren & Darth wooser: Light Ver. to recreate even more of wooser's hand-to-mouth life.
